mapper.select: SELECT doctor_id, username, doctor_name, doctor_gender, doctor_age, doctor_photo, doctor_tel, auth_lv, doctor_info, b.department_name FROM doctor AS a LEFT JOIN department AS b ON a.department_id = b.department_id WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT doctor_id, username, doctor_name, doctor_gender, doctor_age, doctor_tel, auth_lv FROM doctor WHERE is_del = 0 AND department_id = #{departmentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET doctor_age=#{doctorAge}, doctor_info=#{doctorInfo}, doctor_name=#{doctorName}, doctor_gender=#{doctorGender}, doctor_photo=#{doctorPhoto}, update_time=now() WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId}
